name: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest

participants.name: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest

agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, April 24, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. Giovanni Capriglione HB 1917 Murphy Relating to the creation of the disaster response loan fund and the permissible uses of that fund; making an appropriation; authorizing a fee. HJR 42 Metcalf Proposing a constitutional amendment for the creation of an endowment fund for this state and for the retention, transfer, or appropriation of fund assets, including investment earnings received on fund assets. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
